name: bastard
content:
bastard noun [C]
(UNPLEASANT)
offensive an unpleasant person: He was a bastard to his wife. You lied to me, you bastard!humorous You won again? You lucky bastard! (= I don't think you deserve it) This crossword's a bastard (= very difficult).
bastard noun [C]
(CHILD)
old use a person born to parents who are not married to each other: He was born in 1798, the bastard son of a country squire and his mistress. Compare
illegitimate
